name: Chocolate-Chip Cookies
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup light brown sugar, firmly packed
1 package (6 ounces or 1 cup) semisweet chocolate chips

recipeInstructions.text: Sift the flour, baking soda and salt into a large bowl. Add the sugars, egg, extract and butter. With an electric hand-held mixer at medium speed, beat until smooth and well mixed, about 1 minute.
Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Drop by tablespoonful, about 2 inches apart, onto an ungreased baking sheet.
Bake the cookies at 375 degrees for 10 to 12 minutes, until browned. Remove and cool on rack.
